text: tavada ovunge hrdayanda (rju margayehi) api sthira kara hæriyemu. (e samaye siti raja tuma, ovunva piliru aradhana karana men bala karanu læbu avasthavedi), ovun nægi sita “ahasda, bhumiyada nirmanaya kala ayama ape deviyanya. ohu hæra, (vena kisivekut deviyan yayi) api aradhana nokarannemu. (ese aradhana kalahot) niyata vasayenma sudusu næti vadanak pavasannan bavata pat vannemu” yayi kiha
